company_info.name: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation

methodology.philosophy: Swing for the fences con gestión manual de exits
methodology.stop_loss: Ultra conservative: ≤10% enforcement with MIN selection (more restrictive)
methodology.take_profit: Weekly ATR-based: 3.0x/2.5x/2.0x targeting optimized for 1-month holds
methodology.scoring: Momentum weighted (20d 70%, 60d 30%) + acceleration bonus + R/R integration
methodology.fundamental_requirement: ONLY positive earnings + complete fundamental data
methodology.spy_benchmark_fix: Applied - now correctly filters when SPY unavailable
methodology.weekly_atr_optimization: Weekly ATR for take profit alignment with 1-month holding period
methodology.stop_loss_improvement: MIN selection for more restrictive risk filtering
